title: Suella Braverman – 2022 Comments on Reappointment as Home Secretary After Resignation Due to Personal Conduct
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Suella Braverman, the Home Secretary, on 25 October 2022.
content: I am honoured to be appointed by the Prime Minister to serve as Home Secretary.
We will work hard to control our borders, maintain our security and keep our streets safe.
